news: [Shoutout] Thanks for the latest right-to-left Arabic translation contribution, I'll review and integrate it to the next release
[Community] I'm interested in your translation feedbacks, use menu Community to share your fixes and improve the language displayed
[Note] I only produce the English and French translation, any other language is shared by you the community, thanks again
[DNS exfiltration] Implementation is ongoing as injection via DNS works on my setup, also expecting to add integration tests on docker
[RCE shell] How to open RCE shell and reverse shell? For details go to https://github.com/ron190/jsql-injection/wiki/Exploit
[Pinned] Report any bugs and thoughts, add your star at https://github.com/ron190/jsql-injection
